import React, {useState} from "react"; import closeBtn from "../../assets/img/x.svg"; import heartBtn from "../../assets/img/heart.svg"; import heartRed from "../../assets/img/awesome-heart.svg"; import dislikeBtn from "../../assets/img/dislike.svg"; import API from '../../API' const WriteReviews = ({ setShowWriteReview }) => { const api = new API() const [like_count, setLike_count] = useState(1) const [name, setName] = useState('') const [body, setBody] = useState('') const handleClick = (value) => { if (value == 'Good') { rate } } return ( <>
setShowWriteReview(false)} src={closeBtn} class="close-button" alt="" />

handleClick("Good")}>

(5)

(15)

onClick={() => handleClick("vgood")}
handleClick("excellent")}>

handleClick("bad")}>

setName(e.target.value)} id="name" /> {console.log(name)}
setBody(e.target.value)} />
); }; export default WriteReviews;
